Set is an unordered collection of objects called elements or members.

Sequence is a Functions where Domain is Subsets of integers and Codomain is another set $S$.

Backward Substitution

DM
Jun 28, 2020

We start with $a_n$ and reach Initial Condition.

Forward Substitution

DM
Jun 27, 2020

DM
Jun 26, 2020

Closed Formula

DM
Jun 25, 2020

A representation of terms of Sequences that satisfies the Relation and Initial Condition.

Initial Condition

DM
Jun 24, 2020

It specifies the term before the first term of Recurrance Relations.

Solution of Recurrance Relation

DM
Jun 23, 2020

A Sequences is called solution of recurrance relation if it satisfies it.

String

DM
Jun 22, 2020

Sequences of form $a_1, a_2, \dots a_n$ or $a_1 a_2 a_3 \dots a_n$ are called Strings in computer science. Similar to Bit String.
